price: 28. Ya sólo, tozalaki kobondela ye, ya sólo, ye azali malamu mpe atonda mawa.
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
